movies.title: The Terminal
movies.plot: Viktor Navorski is a man without a country; his plane took off just as a coup d'etat exploded in his homeland, leaving it in shambles, and now he's stranded at Kennedy Airport, where he's holding a passport that nobody recognizes. While quarantined in the transit lounge until authorities can figure out what to do with him, Viktor simply goes on living – and courts romance with a beautiful flight attendant.

events.title: Viktor Navorski arrives at an airport terminal and is refused entry

movies.title: Collateral
movies.plot: Cab driver Max picks up a man who offers him $600 to drive him around. But the promise of easy money sours when Max realizes his fare is an assassin.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 68 nominations.

events.title: Max Durocher is hired as a driver for the night by Vincent, a hitman
Max Durocher kills Vincent, saving Annie Farrell from death

movies.title: Lincoln
movies.plot: The revealing story of the 16th US President's tumultuous final months in office. In a nation divided by war and the strong winds of change, Lincoln pursues a course of action designed to end the war, unite the country and abolish slavery. With the moral courage and fierce determination to succeed, his choices during this critical moment will change the fate of generations to come.

movies.title: The Fifth Estate
movies.plot: A look at the relationship between WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange and his early supporter and eventual colleague Daniel Domscheit-Berg, and how the website's growth and influence led to an irreparable rift between the two friends.

The Afghan War Logs are released on Wikileaks

movies.title: Bridge of Spies
movies.plot: During the Cold War, the Soviet Union captures U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers after shooting down his U-2 spy plane. Sentenced to 10 years in prison, Powers' only hope is New York lawyer James Donovan, recruited by a CIA operative to negotiate his release. Donovan boards a plane to Berlin, hoping to win the young man's freedom through a prisoner exchange. If all goes well, the Russians would get Rudolf Abel, the convicted spy who Donovan defended in court.

events.title: start of the Battle for Iwo Jima

movies.title: Flags of Our Fathers
movies.plot: There were five Marines and one Navy Corpsman photographed raising the U.S. flag on Mt. Suribachi by Joe Rosenthal on February 23, 1945. This is the story of three of the six surviving servicemen - John 'Doc' Bradley, Pvt. Rene Gagnon and Pvt. Ira Hayes - who fought in the battle to take Iwo Jima from the Japanese.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 25 nominations.

studios.title: The Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

events.title: Lance Corporals William Schofield and Tom Blake are given an urgent message to deliver
Lance Corporal William Schofield delivers an important message

movies.title: Welcome to Marwen
movies.plot: When a devastating attack shatters Mark Hogancamp and wipes away all memories, no one expected recovery. Putting together pieces from his old and new life, Mark meticulously creates a wondrous town named Marwen where he can heal and be heroic. As he builds an astonishing art installation — a testament to the most powerful women he knows — through his fantasy world, he draws strength to triumph in the real one.

events.title: Steve Lopez publishes an article about Nathaniel Ayers in the LA Times

movies.title: Deep Impact
movies.plot: A seven-mile-wide space rock is hurtling toward Earth, threatening to obliterate the planet. Now, it's up to the president of the United States to save the world. He appoints a tough-as-nails veteran astronaut to lead a joint American-Russian crew into space to destroy the comet before impact. Meanwhile, an enterprising reporter uses her smarts to uncover the scoop of the century.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.plot: As U.S. troops storm the beaches of Normandy, three brothers lie dead on the battlefield, with a fourth trapped behind enemy lines. Ranger captain John Miller and seven men are tasked with penetrating German-held territory and bringing the boy home.

events.title: D-Day

movies.title: The Post
movies.plot: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 111 nominations.

movies.title: First Man
movies.plot: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

events.title: Apollo 11 lands on the moon

movies.title: Munich
movies.plot: During the 1972 Olympic Games in Munich, eleven Israeli athletes are taken hostage and murdered by a Palestinian terrorist group known as Black September. In retaliation, the Israeli government recruits a group of Mossad agents to track down and execute those responsible for the attack.
movies.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 69 nominations.

movies.title: Dreamer: Inspired By a True Story
movies.plot: Ben Crane believes that a severely injured racehorse deserves another chance. He and his daughter Cale adopt the mare and save it from being sacrificed by the owner.

events.title: Mariah's Storm, the horse that Soñador is based on, falls and fractures a bone

movies.title: Seabiscuit
movies.plot: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.
movies.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 37 nominations.

events.title: Seabiscuit beats War Admiral in a match race

movies.title: The Lovely Bones
movies.plot: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family -- and her killer. As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 45 nominations.

events.title: Susie Salmon is murdered by George Harvey

movies.title: Cast Away
movies.plot: Chuck Nolan, a top international manager for FedEx, and Kelly, a Ph.D. student, are in love and heading towards marriage. Then Chuck's plane to Malaysia crashes at sea during a terrible storm. He's the only survivor, and finds himself marooned on a desolate island. With no way to escape, Chuck must find ways to survive in his new home.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 35 nominations.
